trans-unit.source: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Definisce una posizione qualificata dall'attività corrispondente a un evento utente nel percorso di esecuzione potenziale di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro radice.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Un ActivityDesigner o una finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro può utilizzare qualsiasi di overload <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per instrumentare il flusso di lavoro per generare dati di rilevamento di runtime dell'infrastruttura come un evento utente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: I dati generati vengono chiamati per come dati utente.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: A differenza di eventi dello stato dell'attività ed eventi di stato del flusso di lavoro, che si verificano solo in attività o modifiche dello stato del flusso di lavoro, eventi utente possono verificarsi in qualsiasi posizione instrumentata in un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A UserTrackingLocation defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched.
trans-unit.target: Un UserTrackingLocation definisce i parametri corrispondenti per tale posizione specificando il tipo di dati utente, il tipo dell'attività da cui devono essere inviato, una raccolta di condizioni che possono qualificare più precisamente una o più istanze di questa attività, un nome della chiave facoltativo con cui i dati dell'utente devono essere associati, se i tipi derivati dei dati utente devono corrispondere , e se devono essere trovata una corrispondenza dati utente inviati da attività derivate dal tipo dell'attività specificata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A single UserTrackingLocation may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > UserTrackingLocation un singolo può riferirsi a più posizioni effettive nel percorso di esecuzione potenziale di un'istanza del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: You may add a UserTrackingLocation to either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in order to define the match parameters for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere un UserTrackingLocation a uno <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per definire i parametri di corrispondenza di uno <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>in un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the UserTrackingLocation to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esistono tre condizioni generali che devono essere soddisfatte nell'ordine seguente per UserTrackingLocation da far corrispondere dall'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime: attività che ha generato un evento utente deve corrispondere all'insieme di attività specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>; e la chiave, se presente, associata con l'utente dei dati devono corrispondere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>; e il tipo di dati utente generati dall'evento utente deve corrispondere il set di tipi di dati utente specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> , <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the UserTrackingLocation matched.
trans-unit.target: Solo se tutte e tre di queste condizioni vengono soddisfatte, l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime considera il UserTrackingLocation corrispondente.

trans-unit.source: To configure a UserTrackingLocation, you must set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Per configurare un UserTrackingLocation, è necessario impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>per specificare il tipo di dati utente da ricercare e uno <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>per specificare il tipo dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati utente da ricercare.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>oggetti <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A>per qualificare più completo l'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A> to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> should be matched, and you may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> should be matched.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>per specificare che i dati utente derivanti dal tipo di dati utente specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>deve essere trovata una corrispondenza, ed è possibile impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A>per specificare che i dati utente inviati da attività derivata dal tipo di attività specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>devono corrispondere.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedActivityTypes%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.MatchDerivedArgumentTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this UserTrackingLocation.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>per specificare che soltanto l'utente devono corrispondere i dati associati con il nome della chiave per questo UserTrackingLocation.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>è un riferimento null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), struttura di rilevamento di runtime non tenterà di corrisponde alla chiave associata ai dati utente.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.KeyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore predefinito inizializza un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare sia il tipo di dati utente in modo che corrispondano e il tipo di attività da cui devono essere inviato affinché sia possibile ricercarlo.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, to configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> you must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to specify the type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, per configurare il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>è necessario impostare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>per specificare il tipo di un'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati utente per cui trovare una corrispondenza, ed è necessario anche in modo esplicito impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>per specificare il tipo di dati utente da ricercare.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile configurare ulteriormente la <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome non qualificato del tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde ai dati utente del tipo specificato inviati dal flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched for `argumentTypeName`.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente da ricercare `argumentTypeName`.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario impostare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>nel codice per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dei dati utente da ricercare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches user data of the specified type emitted from the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde ai dati utente del tipo specificato inviati dal flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must explicitly set either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> in your code to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario impostare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>nel codice per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente da ricercare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome non qualificato del tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente e il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde a tutti i dati utente del tipo specificato inviati da attività del tipo specificato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity and of the user data.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dell'attività e dei dati utente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>di un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>attività è "Code".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dei dati utente da ricercare.

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome non qualificato del tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente e il tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde a tutti i dati utente del tipo specificato inviati da attività del tipo specificato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dei dati utente da ricercare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente e il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde a tutti i dati utente del tipo specificato inviati da attività del tipo specificato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dell'attività.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For example the unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity is "Code".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>di un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>attività è "Code".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente da ricercare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> class by using the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data and the CLR type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> classe utilizzando il tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente e il tipo CLR dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> that matches all user data of the specified type emitted from activities of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>che corrisponde a tutti i dati utente del tipo specificato inviati da attività del tipo specificato.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: You may further qualify the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> by setting its other properties.
trans-unit.target: È possibile qualificare ulteriormente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>impostando le altre proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente da ricercare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo common language runtime (CLR) dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati utente da rilevare.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the activity in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera specificare il tipo di attività in modo indipendente dalla versione, utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare la proprietà ActivityType o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome non qualificato del tipo common language runtime (CLR) dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati utente da rilevare.

trans-unit.source: You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare il nome non qualificato del tipo dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: For example, to specify the unqualified name of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activity, set ActivityTypeName to "Code".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, per specificare il nome non qualificato di un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>attività, impostare ActivityTypeName su "Code".</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName fornisce un modo molto più semplice per specificare il tipo di attività che ha generato i dati dell'utente quando si crea un profilo direttamente in XML.

trans-unit.source: ActivityTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity.
trans-unit.target: ActivityTypeName fornisce inoltre un modo indipendente dalla versione di fare riferimento al tipo dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ActivityTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare ActivityTypeName o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the activity from which the data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dell'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente da rilevare.

trans-unit.source: If you want to specify the type of the user data in a version-independent manner, use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera specificare il tipo di dati utente in modo indipendente dalla versione, utilizzare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentType or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare ArgumentType o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente da rilevare.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the unqualified name of the common language runtime (CLR) type of the user data to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome non qualificato del tipo common language runtime (CLR) dei dati utente da rilevare.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName provides a much easier way to specify the type of the user data when you author a profile directly in XML.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName fornisce un modo molto più semplice per specificare il tipo di dati utente quando si crea un profilo direttamente in XML.

trans-unit.source: ArgumentTypeName also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the user data.
trans-unit.target: ArgumentTypeName fornisce inoltre un modo indipendente dalla versione di fare riferimento al tipo di dati utente.

trans-unit.source: You must specify either ArgumentTypeName or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A> to properly configure the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: È necessario specificare ArgumentTypeName o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>per configurare correttamente il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unqualified name of the <xref:System.Type> of the user data.
trans-unit.target: Il nome non qualificato del <xref:System.Type>dei dati utente.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di condizioni utilizzate per qualificare l'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati utente da rilevare.

trans-unit.source: You can use Conditions to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare le condizioni per definire più precisamente l'istanza del tipo di attività specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A>da cui deve essere inviato all'evento utente con quello del percorso di rilevamento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to match only <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> activities with an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> equal to "MyCode", you can set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> to "Code" and add an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to Conditions that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode".
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera trovare una corrispondenza solo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>attività con un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A>uguale a "MyCode", è possibile impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A>su "Code" e aggiungere un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>a condizioni che specifica che la proprietà ID dell'istanza dell'attività deve essere uguale a "MyCode".</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.Name%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Every <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition> in Conditions must be true for the activity to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Ogni <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>in condizioni devono essere vere per l'attività da ricercare.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingCondition>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"></xref> that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingConditionCollection"> </xref> utilizzato per qualificare l'attività da cui devono essere inviati i dati dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome con cui i dati utente devono essere associati per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> devono corrispondere.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event.
trans-unit.target: Un ActivityDesigner o una finestra di progettazione del flusso di lavoro può essere <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>per associare una chiave di stringa con i dati utente che viene generati un evento utente.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of KeyName for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to be matched.
trans-unit.target: Se KeyName non è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), la chiave associata ai dati utente deve corrispondere al valore di KeyName per il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>devono corrispondere.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: If KeyName is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> is matched.
trans-unit.target: Se KeyName è un riferimento null (`Nothing`), di rilevamento di runtime infrastruttura verifica la presenza di una chiave corrispondente determinare se il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>viene trovata una corrispondenza.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> key with which the user data must be associated for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"></xref> to be matched or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> chiave con cui i dati utente devono essere associati per il <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation"> </xref> devono corrispondere o un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se i dati utente devono essere rilevati quando vengono inviati da attività derivate dal tipo di attività specificato da <> </> *> o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user data should be tracked when it is emitted from activities derived from the type specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ActivityTypeName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i dati utente devono essere rilevati quando vengono inviati da attività derivate dal tipo specificato dal <> </> *> o <> </> *>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The User tracking location is a way to filter user tracked data.
trans-unit.target: L'utente di tenere traccia della posizione è un modo per filtrare i dati utente rilevati.

trans-unit.source: The user can filter by the type of the user tracked data by specifying the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*>.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può filtrare il tipo di dati utente rilevati specificando il <> </> *> o <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""></xref><xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""></xref> value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> specifies that the user tracked data can be of type ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName or a type derived from the ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di <xref uid="langword_csharp_MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" name="MatchDerrivedArgumentTypes" href=""> </xref> <xref uid="langword_csharp_Boolean" name="Boolean" href=""> </xref> valore <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> specifica che i dati utente rilevati possono essere di tipo ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName o un tipo derivato dal ArgumentType/ArgumentTypeName.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if user data derived from the type of the user data specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentType*> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation.ArgumentTypeName*> should be tracked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se i dati utente derivanti dal tipo di dati utente specificato da <> </> *> o <> </> *> devono essere registrate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
